description: Parâmetros faltando na chamada, tipos de valores inesperado ou operações que vão contra as regras de negócio da API irão disparar essa exceção.
tips: Verifique se todos os parâmetros obrigatórios para a chamada estão sendo enviados.
Em caso de GET, verifique se os nomes de parâmetros estão todos com caracteres minúsculos.
Em caso de POST, verifique se os parâmetros estão sendo enviados respeitando o camel case.
Certifique-se de que os valores passados estão dentro do formado e valor esperado.

error.message: Parameter tickets must be an array and can not be empty.
Parameter 'creditcard' must be an array and can not be empty.
User id must be a integer.
Missing sale object in parameters.
User informed is different from user who generated the transaction.
Missing email information.
Incomplete or invalid email information.
Invalid [fields] parameter format. The parameter must be a list of strings separated by comma. Examples: id, title, venue.
Invalid [state] parameter format. The parameter must be with two lowercase letters. Examples: am, sp, rj.
Invalid location [lat,long] parameter format. The parameter must be passed with both values (lat and long). Examples: lat=-23.5804941&long=-46.685946
Invalid date format. Example: yyyy-mm-dd
Invalid [eventId] parameter format. The parameter must be an integer.
Installments number must be an integer.
Installments number should be greater than one.
Card hash can't be null.
Credit card must be an array. We recommend you to create transactions using cardhash, please check out http://bissu.github.io/ingresse-dev/#/references/shop/post-transaction .
Transaction ID should be an integer.
Invalid [tickets] parameter format. The parameter must be a not empty array. See tickets array example here: http://bissu.github.io/ingresse-dev/#/references/shop/post-transaction .

Invalid [tickets] array element. The parameter must be an array with session, ticket type ID, type and quantity. See tickets array example here: http://bissu.github.io/ingresse-dev/#/references/shop/post-transaction .
Invalid [tickets] array element. Session item without date or time. See tickets array example here: http://bissu.github.io/ingresse-dev/#/references/shop/post-transaction .
Invalid [tickets] array element. The date format is dd/mm/yyyy. Ex: 20/10/2013. See tickets array example here: http://bissu.github.io/ingresse-dev/#/references/shop/post-transaction .
Invalid [tickets] array element. The time format is hh:mm:ss. Ex. 22:30:00. See tickets array example here: http://bissu.github.io/ingresse-dev/#/references/shop/post-transaction .
Invalid [tickets] array element. TicketTypeId must be an integer greater than zero. See tickets array example here: http://bissu.github.io/ingresse-dev/#/references/shop/post-transaction .
Invalid [tickets] array element. Type must be a string with 'Inteira' or 'Meia'. See tickets array example here: http://bissu.github.io/ingresse-dev/#/references/shop/post-transaction .
Invalid [tickets] array element. Quantity ($quantity) must be an integer greater than zero. See tickets array example here: http://bissu.github.io/ingresse-dev/#/references/shop/post-transaction .
Invalid [userId] parameter format. The parameter must be an integer.
Invalid [event_id] parameter format. The parameter must be an integer.
Invalid [eventDateId] parameter format. The parameter must be an integer.
Invalid [discountCode] parameter format. The parameter must be a string.
Invalid [discountCode] parameter format. The parameter must be a string.

Invalid [creditcard] parameter. Some required fields not found. Check those fields: number, holderName, expiracyMonth, expiracyYear and cvv. We recommend you to create transactions using cardhash, please check out http://bissu.github.io/ingresse-dev/#/references/shop/post-transaction .
You are sending [cpf] as an empty field. Please, make sure there is a valid CPF in this field.
Missing [cpf] parameter.
Ticket Code cannot be empty.
User parameter must be an Array.
Missing username parameter.
Parameter below cannot contain zero or negative numbers.
Status code must be an integer.
The value in parameter below is not a number.
The value in parameter below is not a integer.
The value in parameter below must be greater than zero.
Missing publickey parameter.
Missing signature parameter.
Missing timestamp parameter.
